findings.title: A01. Properly emit the related event when the above-mentioned function is being invoked
findings.description: The withdrawAdminFees() function does not emit a corresponding event to reflect its occurrence.

findings.title: Inconsistency Between Document and Implementation
findings.description: There are misleading comments embedded among lines of solidity code, which bring unnecessary hurdles to understand and/or maintain the protocol implementation.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Beamswap contracts implementation, there is a privileged `owner` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol- wide operations.
